DOC.brief_summary: Current modality lymph node stag cancer limit . Needle-based confocal laser endomicroscopy ( nCLE ) novel endoscopic technique , compatible 19-gauge FNA needle . Under endoscopic ultrasonography ( EUS ) guidance , nCLE enable real-time vivo image lesion tissue cellular subcellular levels.This study aim evaluate feasibility needle-based confocal laser endomicroscopy ( nCLE ) time endoscopic ultrasound ( EUS ) describe nCLE feature distinguish benign malignant lymph node .
DOC.brief_title: Endoscopic Ultrasound-guided Needle-based Confocal Laser Endomicroscopy Evaluation Malignant Lymph Nodes - Pilot Study
